nodes.text: A male individual was a member of the Starros clan and the father of Avon Starros. Prior to Avon being sent to Port Haileap in 232 BBY, her father left to chase a dream of mapping hyperspace routes and to live on the edges of Wild Space. Avon recalled that her mother, Ghirra, didn't say anything except tell her that her father would not be joining them for dinner ever again.
